title: Michael Cohen Pleads Guilty & Truth Trump Makes an Appearance | Lindy West
itunes:title: Michael Cohen Pleads Guilty & Truth Trump Makes an Appearance | Lindy West
description:
Michael Cohen pleads guilty to lying about Trump's business dealings with Russia, the V.A. shortchanges veterans, and Lindy West discusses "Shout Your Abortion."
